description: FANTASTIC INDEPENDENT CHALET IN VALDERREY WITH BEDROOM ON THE GROUND FLOOR! We offer you an independent villa, in the best urbanization of Algete, due to the proximity of all services It consists of three floors distributed as follows In the main one, we access the dining room, with entrance to the kitchen and down to the living room with fireplace and direct access to the paved porch with awning. The kitchen, with two entrances, either through the hall of the house or through the dining room as we have mentioned previously. It is equipped with high and low cabinets and basic appliances. Even, exit to the clothesline and the garden We cannot fail to mention the bedroom, with an en-suite bathroom and a dressing area. Indispensable for this type of home! On the upper floor, three bedrooms, all with fitted wardrobes and the main one with an en-suite bathroom and air conditioning with heat pump. Again a bathroom with a shower tray and exterior window for the rest of the rooms. We go down to the basement, where the garage is located and a room with several storage areas to condition it as we like. Outside, the 450 m² garden, perfectly conditioned, with a part that is tiled and another, with natural grass and its wonderful private pool The town is perfectly communicated with Madrid through a wide network of intercity buses, some that leave from Algete and others that come from other municipalities. The main access road is the A-1, although it also has the M-50 ring road. Very close to La Moraleja, Las Tablas, Ciudad de Telefónica and BBVA "La Vela". Don't overthink it! Come visit it!

description: Located in the prestigious gated community of Prado Norte, this semi-detached villa represents the perfect combination of luxury, comfort and lifestyle. With a plot of 321 square meters, this property offers a generous space to enjoy with family or friends, with all the amenities one could wish for. The house has 3 bedrooms, one of them with en suite bathroom, which guarantees privacy and comfort for the residents and the possibility of a fourth bedroom in the attic area. It also has an additional guest toilet. The spaciousness of the bedrooms allows the creation of unique and functional personal spaces, perfect for resting and disconnecting. One of the highlights of this property is the large living room area. This space has been designed to offer comfort and elegance, with details that make it truly special. A glazed terrace connects to the living room, allowing you to enjoy the natural light and garden views all year round. Whether to relax with a good book, enjoy a cup of coffee or receive guests, this area adapts to all needs. The kitchen is a real gem in this villa. Fully equipped and with high quality finishes, it is the perfect place to unleash your culinary skills. It has enough space to create delicious meals and share special moments with family and friends. In terms of location, Prado Norte is a neighborhood that embodies tranquility and exclusivity. Surrounded by greenery and nature, it offers a relaxed atmosphere away from the hustle and bustle of the city. However, you don't have to sacrifice comfort, as it is located just minutes away from the city center and all urban amenities. Prado Norte is characterized by its wide tree-lined streets and serene atmosphere. It is the perfect place for those seeking an oasis of peace to escape the hustle and bustle of everyday stress. In addition, the proximity to parks and recreational areas makes it an ideal place for families and nature lovers. As for the amenities of the urbanization, this semi-detached villa is located in a gated community that offers a spectacular swimming pool and ample green areas. Here, you can enjoy sunny days by the pool or stroll through the manicured gardens with total privacy and security. The property has been completely refurbished to a high standard, which means it is ready to move into immediately. Top quality materials and modern design combine to create a luxurious and elegant atmosphere in every corner of the house. At GILMAR, they understand that buying or selling a property is a personal and emotional experience, and they are here to accompany you every step of the way. Their team of highly trained professionals is ready to provide you with expert advice and guidance, making sure you make informed and wise decisions. So, if you are looking for your dream home in Prado Norte or any other area of interest, don't hesitate to contact GILMAR. With their experience, commitment and passion for the real estate market, they will help you find the perfect property that suits your needs and desires. Since 1983, GILMAR has been fulfilling the dreams of their clients, and they are eager to do the same for you.

suggestedTexts: {'title': 'Semi-detached house in Calle Enrique Casas, 28110 Algete (Madrid), España'}
description: Where is this house located? This semi-detached house for sale is located in Prado Norte - Algete, a municipality that belongs to the Community of Madrid.It is located 20 minutes from Plaza Castilla, 11 minutes from the R2 and M50 highways and fifteen minutes from Adolfo Suarez - Barajas airport, Madrid. The Pardo Norte urbanization is private and closed and is made up of 26 unique alpine-style chalets, with large common areas and a communal pool.The location is very close to the Burgos highway and Fuente el Saz de Jarama. How many square meters does the house have and on how many floors are they distributed? This semi-detached house was built in the year 2000, the current owners being the only ones. This house has been built on a 268m2 plot, with a constructed area of 160m2, distributed over three floors, the main floor, the first floor and the second floor with sloping ceilings. In addition, inside the farm we find a large 24m2 covered porch and space to park 3 vehicles.Outside you can park 2 more vehicles, at the door of the house. How many rooms does it have and where are each located? THE MAIN FLOOR: We enter through the hall and find the 30m2 living-dining room with fireplace, with access to the covered porch.The kitchen has an area of 20m2 and is fully furnished, being a large area in which we can have family life on a daily basis.We highlight in this room the 3 large windows, 1.40m each.On this same floor there is also a toilet, which has a large storage space under the stairs to the first floor. THE FIRST FLOOR: It has the master bedroom, with a full en-suite bathroom, 2 more bedrooms and a bathroom.The main bedroom has an area of 24m2, in addition to the furnished en-suite bathroom, with an exterior window, bathtub, and bidet.The remaining 2 bedrooms each have an area of 11m2 and the full bathroom that serves these two bedrooms also has an exterior window and bathtub. THE SECOND FLOOR WITH ATTIC FLOOR: Which has been renovated and turned into a spacious 35m2 suite room, fully equipped, with a large built-in wardrobe in the stairwell. What kind of qualities does this house have? The house has unbeatable construction qualities. This semi-detached house is heated by propane gas heating, with the possibility of switching to natural gas.The Sanier Duval boiler has an option for this change. In addition, it has fitted wardrobes in all bedrooms, hall and stairwell.Also air conditioning with heat pump in all rooms, fireplace in the living room, alarm, double climalit aluminum windows, stoneware, wooden and marble floors, wooden doors, armored access door to the house, etc. The exterior of the house is conditioned, with garden areas, ideal for family life. Does the urbanization have common areas? Yeah.It has spacious common areas and community pool. With what type of public transport can I move? Algete is very well connected with bus lines 1, 97 and 210, which have extensive schedules.It should be noted that the chalet has a bus stop at the door of the urbanization. What type of service does this municipality have? The municipality has numerous services, including public and private primary schools, secondary schools, its own town hall, health center, various shops, church, restaurants, supermarkets, veterinary centers, pharmacies, banks, post office, etc.

TOWNHOUSE IN ALGETE! Beautiful property, impeccably designed, with two floors and distributed as follows We are greeted by a spacious hall decorated with beautiful exposed wooden beams, which leads us to the kitchen. This, with an office area, provided with wall and base furniture and basic appliances and entrance to the laundry room and pantry. A spacious living room with fireplace with access to the garden and two storage rooms under the stairs. A room, currently used as a dressing room with large closets The bathroom, with a shower tray, which will serve the rooms on this floor. We continue to the upper one. The distributor, on the one hand, shows us a living room that leads us to three bedrooms. On the other, two more bedrooms, one of them with a built-in wardrobe and the other with a dressing room. On this floor, the bathroom has a bathtub and velux window. Outside, the garden mentioned above, with an approximate area of 100 m², partly paved and partly grassed. It has a surface pool and tool room. The town is perfectly connected to Madrid through a wide network of intercity buses, some that leave from Algete and others that come from other municipalities. The main access road is the A-1, although it also has the M-50 ring road. Very close to La Moraleja, Las Tablas, Ciudad de Telefónica and BBVA “La Vela". Come and visit it! Find out yourself!

FIRST LEVEL REAL ESTATE SELLS this spectacular independent villa in the North area of Madrid, with excellent views and within the Valderrey urbanization. It is located on a plot of 1,000 square meters, it has its own 8 x 4 meter pool, equipped with a salt chlorinator, a beautiful consolidated garden with large trees, a porch in the front area and a porch with robotic awnings in the pool area. The chalet has 2 floors and an additional basement with the following distribution: -MAIN FLOOR: It consists of a beautiful large independent living room with a built-in fireplace, a dining room attached to the living room, a good-sized kitchen, 1 bedroom and 1 bathroom. From the living room we go out to a wonderful porch, right above the pool. -FIRST FLOOR: It consists of 3 bedrooms, the main one has an additional space currently used as an office and has an en-suite bathroom. A second bedroom with another additional space as a study and a third large bedroom, all of them with built-in wardrobes, excellent views and equipped with air conditioning. -BASEMENT FLOOR: It consists of a garage with robotic doors both at the entrance to the plot and to the garage itself, a huge 30-meter games room or gym and a pantry with a washing machine, dryer, refrigerator, etc.. . The garage has been completely waterproofed in 2022. The conservation of the property and the plot is extraordinary, having been designed and decorated with very good taste and with care for all the details. It is equipped with 2 garden sheds, one of them for the treatment plant, woodshed area, fountain, etc.. . The plot has 2 water connections, one for irrigation use from a well, with a symbolic price, and the normal one for daily use from the Canal de Isabel II. 8 SOLAR PANELS have just been installed to make the home energy sustainable. The floors are marble on the ground floor and parquet on the first floor. The chalet is equipped with air conditioning in all main areas. If you need financing, consult our mortgage conditions.

description: SUPERB APARTMENT OF 246M2 WITH PATIO AND GARAGE IN THE CENTER OF ALGETE This house is a town house from the year 1950 that underwent a comprehensive reform in 1983 making an extension, but today it has many possibilities to have a spectacular home in the very center of Algete with all services within walking distance. The building consists of two floors giving one of the floors to a street and the other to the street behind, taking advantage of the slope of the land. At the front we have a pedestrian access and at the rear the garage. In the first place, we access the GROUND FLOOR through a beautiful patio where we have a wood-burning oven and a barbecue. We enter the house and we find a distributor hall, on the left we have a double room that communicates in turn with another that has currently been converted into a dressing room, then we have a complete bathroom with a shower tray that serves all On this floor, the next door in the hall leads to another double room and then to the fitted kitchen, from which we have access to the upper floor via a staircase. From the patio we also have access to a large living room with kitchen, fireplace and wine cellar ideal for meetings, parties and events due to its large size. From this room there is a staircase that connects us directly with the garage that is on the top floor. We go up to the UPPER FLOOR through the kitchen and first of all we find a large living-dining room that has an imposing size terrace, we also have a full bathroom with a bathtub and two bedrooms. The Garage has an automatic door, a permanent ford and capacity for one or two vehicles. The qualities of the house are from the year of the last reform, but it has double aluminum windows, oil heating with iron radiators, smooth paint, stoneware floors and a thermos for hot water. Do not miss the opportunity to visit what could be your very good sized house in the center of Algete and at an incredible price, a few meters from the town hall, bus stops, shopping centers, pharmacy, etc. POSSIBILITY OF GETTING 100% FINANCING ACCORDING TO CONDITIONS. ASK US WITHOUT COMMITMENT. This and more properties in Follow us on facebook: Molgar Real Estate Management Become a follower of our Youtube channel: Instagram: @molgarinmobiliaria <.

Wonderful single-family home, unique and singular, located within the Prado Norte urbanization in the town of Algete. From the moment you enter the plot, the house stands out for how impressive it is with its three floors, its consolidated garden, its natural stone and its total orientation. The plot consists of a 2000 m2 land, where we find a majestic house of 580 m2 built divided into 3 floors and a second construction, an additional 55 m2 independent plotted house, forming part of the complex. Entering through the main entrance, we find an elegant hall-hall, open space with an exceptional staircase, which gives direct access to the ground floor of the house, which has a size of 250 m2 including the 50m2 terrace. The ground floor is made up of a fabulous 55m2 living room with an exceptional fireplace, beautiful and large windows with impressive views of the garden, making the space even more pleasant.On this same floor we find two bedrooms, the main one spacious and bright with excellent views of the pool that you will fall in love with, it also has a dressing area and a wonderful en-suite bathroom with a bathtub and separate shower. The second room with very good ventilation and a large built-in wardrobe. In addition, on this floor we find a guest toilet at the entrance with a bathtub and a large kitchen (36m2) with enough space to distribute the space according to convenience. From the kitchen or living room you can access one of the best views of the house, its fabulous 50m2 terrace. Through the beautiful staircase, you access the first floor with 110m2, an extraordinary open space, light floods the space, the cross ventilation is great with a balcony overlooking the main entrance of the house. It also stands out for having an 18m2 terrace with clear views that you will hardly be able to fall in love with, facing the northern mountains and the pool. This floor has two very bright rooms of 15m2 each with built-in wardrobes and an attic area.We also find a bathroom with a shower cabin and a beautiful double sink. On the lower floor of the house, its 247m2, give rise to a large and spacious garage with capacity for four vehicles, boiler room, bathroom with shower, laundry room, two guest rooms with beautiful exterior views and two other rooms. that can be allocated to the use that each one wants to give it. From the garage or from the sides of the house you can access the impressive consolidated garden with trees, grass and an extraordinary pool where you can enjoy unique moments with family and friends. From the pool area, we have direct access to an additional 55 m2 house composed of a bedroom, living room, bathroom and kitchen, which has air conditioning and heating. The entire main house has a heating system powered by a 1500l diesel boiler, clay floors, exceptional windows and enclosures and double glazing. The location is unbeatable in the urbanization, a quiet and quiet area, with quick access to the Burgos Highway and the town of Algete where we find all kinds of services. We will be happy to show you this unique and singular house, we are waiting for you!

Gilmar Consulting Inmobiliario Santo Domingo offers semi-detached house in Urbanization Valderrey, with easy access to road communications and located in a very quiet area with parks, school and leisure services nearby. This house of large dimensions and private indoor heated pool has 5 floors: - On the main floor we find a large living room with several heights, fireplace and access to outdoor terrace. It also has a separate kitchen and toilet. - On the second floor, it has a large master bedroom with several heights and bathroom en suite. Two bedrooms with fitted closets and bathroom in distributor. - On the top floor, a large attic illuminated with natural light due to its large windows in the staircase area. This attic is divided into several heights and rooms to be able to distribute it in many ways. Complete bathroom. - On the lower floor of garages, we have space for two cars inside and at least two other cars on the entrance ramp. In addition to several outbuildings that can be used as storage, cellar, laundry room.. . - On a floor that could be the basement, a large indoor pool is the protagonist, which together with its shower, bathroom, and separate room where you can put a gym or a sauna / jacuzzi, will give us that relaxation we need in the day to day. The urbanization also has a communal swimming pool. Algete is equipped with all the basic services (educational, commercial, business and industrial, sports and leisure), which makes this town an ideal place to live.  The town is perfectly communicated with Madrid through a wide network of intercity buses, some leaving from Algete and others coming from other surrounding municipalities. The main access road is the A-1, although it also has the M-50 ring road and there are plans to build an R-1 toll road parallel to the A-1. Very close to the business developments of La Moraleja, Las Tablas, Ciudad de Telefónica and BBVA La Vela.

Beautiful semi-detached house in Soto del Duque Engel and Völkers exclusively presents this beautiful semi-detached house of high quality and excellent design located in the valued area of Soto del Duque. With four large bedrooms and 178 square meters on a plot of approximately 400 m2, we offer a magnificent home with all the comforts and possibilities you want for your next home. The property is located within an urbanization with private access, common areas with sports facilities and a swimming pool. The description of the house begins on the ground floor, which shows us a wonderful living room with direct access to a large garden, a large fitted kitchen and a guest toilet. On the upper floor we have three large bedrooms, one of them with an en-suite bathroom and another bathroom that serves the other rooms. Then we will climb a comfortable staircase to an impressive attic. The Soto del Duque urbanization within the Prado Norte district, located in the municipality of Algete and very close to Fuente el Saz del Jarama, enjoys a quiet and well-connected environment, close to recreational areas, shopping centers, schools and sports centers and golf courses. Its proximity to the Jarama River offers a privileged environment that allows you to enjoy the advantages of living in contact with nature and practicing sports such as cycling, hiking or enjoying horseback riding in the numerous nearby horse riding arenas. The urbanization is perfectly connected to the city of Madrid (A1, R2, M50).
